#nametype [nametype]: 151
When the kingdom of Ur was divided and the city states of Uruk emerged much changed. The City of Trade made contact with other kingdoms and new trade routes were established. Iron-working and other foreign technologies became available to the Enkidus. Now all Ensis have equipped their troops iron armaments.
